Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can illustrate people trying to communicate over a long distance.
The student can include a drawing of a string telephone, showing how it uses sound to send and receive information between two students.
The student can use the materials provided, such as cups and string, in their drawing of the string telephone device.
The student can depict how the string telephone allows students to communicate by sending sound from one cup to the other over a given distance.
The student can show or label how the device relies on technology or science by using sound for communication.
The student can illustrate or describe in their drawing how the use of the string telephone helps people communicate over distances.
